body:
Abraham,

I updated the example file so that the geometry is internalized:

[https://github.com/chriswmackey/hydra_2/commit/e856a0bf1b34b66e461f...](https://github.com/chriswmackey/hydra_2/commit/e856a0bf1b34b66e461f92cdef0138767b171afd)

Also, the THERM example files each should come with a Rhino file in the .zip folder.

-Chris
